name: MailboxEnums
description: Includes the ItemType, EntityType, AttachmentType, RecipientType, ResponseType, and ItemNotificationMessageType enumerations.

items.name: Message
items.description: An email meeting request meeting response or meeting cancellation.

items.name: Appoinment
items.description: An appointment item.

items.name: Address
items.description: Specifies that the entity is a postal address.

items.name: Contact
items.description: Specifies that the entity is a contact.

items.name: EmailAddress
items.description: Specifies that the entity is SMTP email address.

items.name: MeetingSuggestion
items.description: Specifies that the entity is a meeting suggestion.

items.name: PhoneNumber
items.description: Specifies that the entity is US phone number.

items.name: TaskSuggestion
items.description: Specifies that the entity is a task suggestion.

items.name: URL
items.description: Specifies that the entity is an Internet URL.

items.name: File
items.description: The attachment is a file.

items.name: Item
items.description: The attachment is an Exchange item.

enums.name: Office.MailboxEnums.RecipientType
enums.description: Specifies the type of recipient for an appointment.

items.name: Other
items.description: The recipient is not one of the other recipient types.

items.name: DistributionList
items.description: The recipient is a distribution list containing a list of email addresses.

items.name: User
items.description: The recipient is an SMTP email address that is on the Exchange server.

items.name: ExternalUser
items.description: The recipient is an SMTP email address that is not on the Exchange server.

enums.name: Office.MailboxEnums.ResponseType
enums.description: Specifies the type of response to a meeting invitation.

items.name: None
items.description: There has been no response from the attendee.

items.name: Organizer
items.description: The attendee is the meeting organizer.

items.name: Tentative
items.description: The meeting request was tentatively accepted by the attendee.

items.name: Accepted
items.description: The meeting request was accepted by the attendee.

items.name: Declined
items.description: The meeting request was declined by the attendee.

enums.name: Office.MailboxEnums.ItemNotificationMessageType
enums.description: Specifies the notification message type for an appointment or message.

items.name: ProgressIndicator
items.description: The notificationMessage is a progress indicator.

items.name: InformationalMessage
items.description: The notificationMessage is an informational message.

items.name: ErrorMessage
items.description: The notificationMessage is an error message.
